dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare venture into my domain, mortal? What brings you to challenge the might of Aurelius the Undying?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the power of the Heart of Light to bring balance to this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Balance, you speak of balance? There is no balance while darkness envelopes this world. Your endeavors are futile.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The darkness can be lifted, and I will use the Heart of Light to achieve it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Deluded fool. The Heart of Light is beyond your reach. Prepare to face the wrath of the Shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will face whatever challenges come my way to fulfill my purpose.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Your purpose ends here, in the shadows of eternity. Brace yourself for your doom!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to back down. The darkness will yield to the light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from one so naive. Darkness will always prevail. Embrace your fate, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have come to face Aurelius and claim the Heart of Light for my own.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Claim the Heart of Light? You are nothing but a speck of dust in the grand tapestry of eternity. Prepare for oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am more than you think, and I will prove it by defeating you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Overconfidence will be your downfall, interloper. Face the eternal darkness with defiance!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Defeating you is the first step towards claiming what is rightfully mine.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Rightfully yours? Such arrogance. Your path leads only to annihilation. Embrace the void!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am a shadow that seeks to engulf this world in eternal darkness, starting with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A fellow agent of darkness, I see. Yet, your power pales in comparison to the abyss from whence I hail.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My darkness shall swallow even the mightiest of lights, starting with the Heart of Light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Your arrogance blinds you. The Heart of Light will never succumb to the likes of you. Prepare for oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Oblivion is but a stepping stone on my path to dominion over this world.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Dominion? Your ambition knows no bounds, yet your downfall is assured. Embrace the shadows' embrace.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The embrace of shadow consumes all. I am merely an instrument of its will.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Instrument or not, your fate is sealed. The darkness claims you now, puppet of shadows!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your darkness shall be engulfed by an even greater void, starting with me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Audacious words, shadow. Yet, the void you seek is but a fleeting dream in the vast expanse of eternity.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Dreams manifest into reality through the will of the void. Prepare for your end.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from one so insignificant. The abyss awaits your futile struggle. Embrace your oblivion!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Insignificance is a matter of perspective. The void will reveal the truth in due time.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your truth leads only to annihilation. Embrace the emptiness that awaits, for it shall be your final resting place.
